Use on a champion to create a 1-star copy on your bench.

TFT_Item_Bloodthirster.description:
Gain 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

Take 7% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

Combat start: Shoot a beam that 30% Mana Reaves enemies.

TFT_Item_IonicSpark.description:

TFT_Item_JeweledGauntlet.description:
Abilities can critically strike.

TFT10_Consumable_EDM_Selector.description:

Jax: Every ? seconds.
Lux: Every ? seconds.
Zac: Every ? seconds.
Zed: Every ? seconds.

TFT_Assist_RuneOfAllegiance.name: Rune of Allegiance
TFT_Assist_RuneOfAllegiance.description:
Use on any non-Headliner champion to transfer them to your partner. Any items held will pop off.

Once used, this item regenerates in 7 rounds.

[Cannot be used in combat.]
[Consumable - this item disappears when used.]

TFT_Assist_LesserRuneOfAllegiance.name: Lesser Rune of Allegiance
TFT_Assist_LesserRuneOfAllegiance.description:
Place on a Tier 1, 2, or 3 non-Headliner champion to transfer them to your partner. Any items held will pop off.

Once used, this item regenerates in 5 rounds. At 4-1 it upgrades into a Rune of Allegiance.

[Cannot be used in combat.]
[CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used.]

TFT_Consumable_TrainingDummy.name: Target Dummy
TFT_Consumable_TrainingDummy.description:

[Cannot be used in combat.
Consumable - This item disappears when used.]
